item.title: Oscilloscope
item.description: Produced an Arduino-based USB oscilloscope capable of measuring signals up to 20kHz, with AC/DC coupling and hardware 1X/10X scaling

item.title: Entry Fob Replication
item.description: Reverse engineered and replicated an access fob for my residence at the time
